Rock Surfing.name: Rock Surfing
Rock Surfing.blurb: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.
Rock Surfing.description: Innate: Taliyah gains up to 20% − 45% (based on level)  bonus movement speed, which builds up over 1 second if she had been near terrain or structures for at least 0.4 seconds and decays by the same amount if out of range for at least 0.8 seconds.
Rock Surfing.description2: Entering combat or casting an ability puts Rock Surfing on a 2 second  cooldown that is continuously refreshed while remaining in combat.
Rock Surfing.notes:
* Taliyah's basic attack disables Rock Surfing on-hit. If the target dies before the projectile connects, Rock Surfing will not go on cooldown.
 The build up and decay changes by the same amount in the same interval, which is 25% of the maximum value every 0.25 seconds.

Threaded Volley.name: Threaded Volley
Threaded Volley.blurb: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
Threaded Volley.description: Active: After 0.25 seconds, Taliyah unleashes 5 Stone Shards in quick succession in the target direction over 1.5 seconds, dealing  magic damage to the first target hit. Units hit by multiple Stone Shards take 50% damage beyond the first.
Threaded Volley.description2: Taliyah can move and cast other abilities while launching Stone Shards. After launching the third Stone Shard she's also able to basic attack.
Threaded Volley.description3: Casting Threaded Volley creates an area of Worked Ground 450 units radius wide around Taliyah that lasts 45 seconds. While on Worked Ground, Taliyah only hurls one Stone Shard upon casting Threaded Volley and reduces its  mana cost to 1.
Threaded Volley.notes:
* The first Stone Shard hit on each target is considered  single target  spell damage and triggers effects such as Shock from  Muramana, while additional ones of the same cast are considered  persistent damage.
 The first Stone Shard is launched instantly after the cast time. After 0.5 seconds is then launched the second and after the same delay is then launched the third. After another 0.25 seconds is launched the fourth and after the same delay is then launched the fifth.
  Spell shield only prevents one instance of damage.

Seismic Shove.name: Seismic Shove
Seismic Shove.blurb: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
Seismic Shove.description: Active: After 0.25 seconds, Taliyah marks the target location and selects a direction. After 1 second, the ground erupts, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and  knocking them in the chosen direction for 1 second.
Seismic Shove.notes: * Seismic Shove can knock targets over walls.

Unraveled Earth.name: Unraveled Earth
Unraveled Earth.blurb: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
Unraveled Earth.description: Active: After 0.25 seconds, Taliyah scatters 18 boulders over the ground in a cone before her, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.
Unraveled Earth.description2: The boulders then remain for 4 seconds,  slowing all enemies within the area by 20% (+ 4% per 100 AP). At the end of their duration, all remaining boulders explode, dealing Unraveled Earth's initial damage once more.
Unraveled Earth.description3: Enemies who  dash over or are  knocked through the boulders will detonate them instantly, each dealing magic damage. Enemies can detonate multiple boulders, but they will only take damage from a maximum of 4, reduced by 0% − 45% (based on boulder hit).
Unraveled Earth.notes: * Triggering a boulder deals damage only to the enemy that detonated it.

Weaver's Wall.name: Weaver's Wall
Weaver's Wall.blurb: Stone Weaver creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
Weaver's Wall.description: Active: Taliyah channels for 1 second before summoning a massive wall of spiraling rock that tears through the battlefield in the target direction, creating impassable terrain for 5 seconds and  knocking aside allied and enemy champions it passes through as it emerges.
Weaver's Wall.description2: Taliyah can reactivate Weaver's Wall while channeling to  ride atop the wall at 1500 speed as it emerges. Taking damage during or after the cast time will force her off the wall, which will continue along its path normally. After 0.75 seconds she can input a movement command to manually jump off the wall.
Weaver's Wall.description3: Weaver's Wall can be reactivated after it reaches its maximum range to destroy it instantly.
Weaver's Wall.notes:
* The  knockup on allied champions can be used by an enemy  Yasuo to trigger  Last Breath.
 If Weaver's Wall is allowed to expire normally, the wall collapses with the same progression as it was formed.
 She's more likely to jump off to the left side of Weaver's Wall.
